intro.summary: FrontEnd Engineer focused on creating stunning digital products

about.title: About
about.text: My journey as a FrontEnd Engineer has been marked by multiple successful transitions of products from the ground up. By leading teams effectively, I ensure a workspace where teams can flourish, adding to our collective ability to craft stunning products. Currently, I work mostly with TypeScript, Vue, Nuxt,TailwindCSS, Node.js, and Laravel. For over 7 years, I have been immersed in remote collaborations with companies around the world.
